review: First let me say I am a prime member and a HUGE Amazon fan but I am disappointed in this product. It freezes frequently (daily lately and  we've owned it for about 6 months). It often needs rebooting which requires me to sign back into HULU Plus and Netflix repeatedly. Originally when we received the product we thought it was Hulu since they are pretty glitchy themselves but we also have a Sony BluRay and a Roku and have not experienced these problems. I think they should have product tested further.PROS: Home Screen configuration/layout, remote, LOVE that I can view my pics and dome videos from my cloud easily, beautiful screen saversCONS: very glitchy
author: K. Barbour "Kelly B."

review: Best nerd toy ever! At first I couldn't imagine how it was going to improve our TV watching & once we had it installed- an all of 30 seconds to install- plus into the ubs port on the side of the TV & an electrical outlet. It works with our Amazon Prime account & we are watching programs & movies we love instead of the junk on regular TV. Being handicapped I love being able to watch decent fun programs during the day. I loved it so much we now had 2 so we can leave them plugged into our TV's & bought one for my daughter too!
